text:
I want Pennsylvanians to — as safely as possible — get back to the activities they most enjoy.
 
Remember that as long as #COVID19 is a threat, no social activity outside your home where you will run into others is completely without risk of catching this virus. https://t.co/Y7OeoqNl02
